base.name: BusSelector
base.description: Extract the selected signals from the bus signal as outputs of this block.

parameter_definitions.name: bus_type
parameter_definitions.description: The bus type to extract signals from.
parameter_definitions.$comment: Displays the name, but stores the project scope ID. Used in conjunction with `project_uuid` to uniquely identify the bus type.

parameter_definitions.name: project_uuid
parameter_definitions.description: The UUID of the project that the bus type belongs to.
